mapper.insert: insert into a_member(member_id, member_email, name, password, address, phone_no, credit, bank_name, account_no, enabled) values(#{memberId},#{memberEmail},#{name},#{password},#{address},#{phoneNo},#{credit},#{bankName},#{accountNo},#{enabled})
mapper.update: update a_member set name=#{name} , address=#{address}, phone_no = #{phoneNo}, bank_name=#{bankName},account_no=#{accountNo} where member_id =#{memberId} and password=#{password}
mapper.select: select * from post order by sysdate desc
